resources.string: Eva
Settings
To start demonstration say \"oh mighty computer\".
Say \"digits\", \"forecast\" or \"phones\" to choose the grammar, language model or phonetic decoder example.
To try recognition of digits: say something like \"one two three four five\".
To try recognition of a weather forecast like \"sunny spells on Wednesday\".
To try phonetic recognition say anything.
There is a problem with your audio recording device
A client error has occurred
You do not have sufficient permissions. Make sure RECORD_AUDIO permission is granted
A network error has occurred. If you are using Marshmallow and above you can temporarily set offlinemode true
SpeechRecognition could not find a match. Make sure the right language is set
SpeechRecognition is busy at the moment. Try using multiple instances to listen
No speech input detected
SpeechRecognition server error. Try again in few minutes
Undefined error
Permission Denial, you must grant RECORD_AUDIO permission or set handleAudioPermissions(true)
This operation is not supported. Set handleAudioPermissions(true) to allow
OnSpeechRecognitionPermissionListener has not been initialized
OnSpeechRecognitionListener has not been initialized
Speech Recognition is not available on this device

Close navigation drawer
